name: Ensol
description:
Wake up in an unknown cabin with no memories of who you are and what this place is. With the only companion in the room being …

a robot cat?

Who are you? What is going on? Why are you being warned to not go outside? Uncover all of these secrets and more.

Ensol is a 3D isometric narrative RPG set in a solarpunk world where the real enemies are the ones that want the best for you. Encounter enemies, upgrade your weapons, and ask your robot cat what is going on?!

Features:
  • Engaging story where every enemy has its own purpose.
  • A beautiful forest environment, all natural... or is it?
  • Unlock weapon upgrades as you progress.
  • A pettable robot Cat.
  • Smooth yet challenging combat.
